text:
I want to build an account using the developer account.
There was a problem while following the work using the guide below.

(<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/creating-an-app?hubs_signup-url=developers.HubSpot.com%2F&hubs_signup-cta=null&_conv_v=vi%3A1*sc%3A68*cs%3A1599719995*fs%3A1592626390*pv%3A102*ps%3A1599717553*exp%3A%7B%7D&_conv_s=si%3A68*sh%3A1599719994952-0.9001282519554901*pv%3A1&_ga=2.76967701.1424130736.1599457696-1374352265.1599030299>) and clientid,CAs a result of starting npm using the LIENT_SECRET using vscode, the app install link came out, but there was a problem in selecting the account.
"Request for Integration Permissions" is showing up, so I did a search. As a result of the search, the permissions were changed to the Chief Administrator because it was a matter of permissions, but the problem is the same. What is the solution?
